features.name: contacted_date
features.business_logic: Date lead entered 'Contacting' stage - temporal anchor

features.name: firm_crd_at_contact
features.business_logic: Firm CRD at contacted_date (Gap Tolerant - Last Known Value)

features.name: days_in_gap
features.business_logic: Days between job end date and contacted_date. 0 = no gap (active employment). Positive = advisor in employment gap. Higher values may indicate transition period = opportunity.
features.notes: NEW: Gap-tolerant logic recovers ~63% of leads. This feature captures employment transition periods.

features.name: industry_tenure_months
features.business_logic: Total months in industry calculated from employment history end dates. Very long tenure may indicate less mobility.
features.null_handling: Impute with median, create indicator for missing

features.name: num_prior_firms
features.business_logic: Count of firms worked at before current. Higher mobility may indicate openness to change.

features.name: current_firm_tenure_months
features.business_logic: Months at current firm as of contact. Very long tenure may indicate low mobility. For gap cases, represents tenure at last known firm.

features.name: pit_moves_3yr
features.business_logic: Count of firm changes in 36 months prior to contact. VALIDATED: Advisors with 3+ moves have 11% conversion vs 3% baseline (3.8x lift). Top predictor alongside Firm Net Change.
features.notes: HIGH PRIORITY SIGNAL - Validated in Rep Mobility analysis

features.name: pit_mobility_tier
features.business_logic: Categorical mobility classification: 'Highly Mobile' (3+ moves in 3yr, 11% conversion), 'Mobile' (2 moves), 'Average' (1 move), 'Stable' (0 moves). VALIDATED: Highly Mobile tier has 3.8x lift over baseline.
features.notes: HIGH PRIORITY SIGNAL - Categorical version of pit_moves_3yr. One-hot encode for model.

features.name: firm_aum_pit
features.business_logic: Firm AUM as of pit_month (month before contacted_date). Large firms may be harder to recruit from, but also have more resources.

features.name: firm_rep_count_at_contact
features.business_logic: Number of advisors at firm as of contacted_date, calculated from employment history. Larger firms may have more turnover opportunities.

features.name: aum_growth_since_jan2024_pct
features.business_logic: AUM growth from Jan 2024 baseline to pit_month. Declining AUM may indicate distress = opportunity. **Note:** Due to limited history (Jan 2024+), this replaces the 12-month growth metric.
features.notes: Replaces aum_growth_12mo_pct due to limited historical data

features.name: firm_net_change_12mo
features.business_logic: Net change in advisors at firm (arrivals - departures) in 12 months before contact. Negative = bleeding talent = opportunity. VALIDATED: Most predictive feature alongside pit_moves_3yr.
features.notes: HIGH PRIORITY SIGNAL - Empirically validated as top predictor

features.name: firm_stability_score
features.business_logic: Derived stability score: 50 + (net_change_12mo * 3.5), clamped to 0-100. Lower scores indicate more instability = higher opportunity. Empirically validated formula.
features.notes: Derived from firm_net_change_12mo using validated formula

features.name: target
features.business_logic: Binary target: 1 = converted to MQL within 30 days, 0 = mature lead never converted. NULL = right-censored (excluded from training).
